domain_description: Enter the name of your workspace to sign in

migration.title: Some accounts needs to be updated.
migration.desc: A migration has occured, and some accounts needs an action from you to be fully active. They have been set the status "Migrated" and you now have to update them one by one.
migration.desc_hsm_app_updated: Some HSM coin apps has been updated. You need to update the accounts impacted.
